trans-unit.source: Represents a header or footer that is associated with a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa um cabeçalho ou rodapé que está associado com um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> provides header and footer information for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner> when it is displayed in print preview mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> Fornece informações de cabeçalho e rodapé para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner> quando ele for exibido no modo de visualização de impressão.

trans-unit.source: If provided by the workflow designer, users can configure headers and footers on the **Header/Footer** tab on the **Page Setup** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Se fornecida pelo designer de fluxo de trabalho, os usuários podem configurar cabeçalhos e rodapés no **cabeçalho/rodapé** guia o **Configurar página** caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: The SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner with which the
trans-unit.target: SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner com o qual o

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> is a header; <see langword="false" /> to indicate that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> is a footer.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar que o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> é um cabeçalho. <see langword="false" /> para indicar que o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> é um rodapé.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the root designer to which the header or footer is applied.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o designer raiz ao qual o cabeçalho ou rodapé é aplicado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> to which the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> para que o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> é aplicada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle of the header or footer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo delimitador para o cabeçalho ou rodapé na superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that bounds the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que limites de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image associated with the header or footer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a imagem associada ao cabeçalho ou rodapé.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser associado ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle for the image associated with the header or footer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo delimitador da imagem associada ao cabeçalho ou rodapé.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the bounds for the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Image" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que define os limites para o <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Image" /> associado a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A> is calculated using the Bounds of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> to draw the image in the upper left corner of the header/footer.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A> é calculado usando os limites do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> para desenhar a imagem no canto superior esquerdo do cabeçalho/rodapé.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> when the elements it contains are repositioned by the user.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> quando os elementos que ele contém são reposicionados pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Draws the header or footer associated with the workflow root designer on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o cabeçalho ou rodapé associado com o designer de raiz de fluxo de trabalho na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text description associated with the header or footer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a descrição de texto associada ao cabeçalho ou rodapé.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the text description associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres que contém a descrição de texto associada a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle for the text associated with the header or footer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo delimitador do texto associado ao cabeçalho ou rodapé.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the bounds for the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que define os limites para o <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text" /> associado a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.TextRectangle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.TextRectangle%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.TextRectangle%2A> is calculated using the Bounds of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> as well as the location and size of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.TextRectangle%2A> é calculado usando os limites do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> , bem como o local e o tamanho do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A>.
